item.title: The Tech Behind the Metaverse: An Overview for Developers
item.description: A metaverse 🌌 is a virtual world 🌎 that is created by the collective imagination 🧠 of its users and can be accessed through the internet 🌐. It is a shared digital space 💻 where people 🙍‍♂️🙍‍♀️ can interact with each other 🤝 and with virtual objects 💎 and environments 🌲 in real-time. Metaverses 🌌 have been around for decades, but recent advances in technology 🤖 have made it possible for developers 💻 to create more immersive and interactive experiences.
